text: The Mysterious Wall () is a 1967 Soviet science fiction movie directed by Irina Povolotskaya and Mikhail Sadkovich.Кинотеатр "Иллюзион" представит специальную программу ко Дню космонавтикиТаинственная стена It stars Lev Krugly, Tatyana Lavrova, and Irakli Uchaneishvili. ==Actors== *Lev Krugly - Yegor Lomov, scientist *Tatyana Lavrova - Lena, the bride of Lomov *Irakli Uchaneishvili - Andrei Iraklyevich Erdeli, scientist *Andrei Mironov - Valentin Karpukhin == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1967 science fiction movies Category:Soviet science fiction movies Category:Russian science fiction movies
title: The Mysterious Wall
